items.badge_description: Fresh from the tap is one of the best ways to enjoy a beer. Just try to use a glass and not drink directly from the tap, as tempting as it may be. That's 280 checkins with the serving style of Draft. Try 5 more for Level 57!

Porters and Stouts are rich with both history and flavor. Roasty, dark, and delicious, these two styles helped start it all. That’s 105 different beers with the style of Porter or Stout. Try 5 more for Level 22!
It's New Brew Thursday! Drink any beer you have never had before on three different Thursdays in a 20 day period.
It's cold outside - warm up with Winter beers. That's at least 15 different Winter beers try 5 more for Level 4!
99 bottles of beer on the wall, 99 bottles of beer. Take one down, pass it around.... That's 65 checkins with the serving style of Bottle. Try 5 more for Level 14!
We believe in IPA and you should too. You certainly have a taste for the hops! That's 5 different IPAs. Try 5 more for Level 21! Want to learn more about this badge? Check out our podcast

While spontaneity can be fun, sometimes you want to make sure your adventure will rock. Checkout the menu at an Untappd Verified Venue before visiting and know exactly what’s on tap! That's 450 check-ins at venue that is verified.  Try 5 more for Level 91!

Looking for more kick than a session beer, but want to be able to stay for a few rounds? You have to keep it in the middle. That's 415 beers with an ABV greater than 5% and less than 10%.  Try 5 more for Level 84!

items.badge_name: Beyond a Shadow of a Stout (Level 13)
items.badge_description: We all love Stouts, and now we have a dedicated badge to celebrate your dedication to these dark, top-fermented beer in multiple variations, like Oatmeal, Milk and more! Which one will you start with? That's 65 different beers with the style of Stout. Try 5 more for Level 14!

beer.beer_name: Die Hard Is A Christmas Movie

items.badge_description: At a new place and don't want to choose a pint of something you may not like? Grab a few tasters! Enjoy some small pours and then decide which to upgrade to a full pour. That's 45 checkins with the serving style of Taster. Try 5 more for Level 10! Want to learn more about this badge? Check out our podcast

It takes the perfect amount of light, the right framing and a touch of creative love to get the perfect picture of your brew. Now it’s time to drink it! That's 360 check-ins with a photo.  Try 5 more for Level 73!

One of the most important parts of the holiday season is taking time to give back. Need some inspiration? Check out our list of 12 beer businesses that have given back to their community on the Untappd Blog

While spontaneity can be fun, sometimes you want to make sure your adventure will rock. Checkout the menu at an Untappd Verified Venue before visiting and know exactly what’s on tap! That's 445 check-ins at venue that is verified.  Try 5 more for Level 90!

Thanks for staying at home, and checking in with Untappd! It allows us to stay connected to a community of beer lovers, just like you, even if we can't be in the same physical location. From our home to yours, cheers and stay safe!

Looking for more kick than a session beer, but want to be able to stay for a few rounds? You have to keep it in the middle. That's 410 beers with an ABV greater than 5% and less than 10%.  Try 5 more for Level 83!
Welcome to BCBC! Thank you for coming out to Western Loudoun County and trying one of our delicious brews on our beautiful 33-acre property in Bluemont, VA! Cheers!

Want to enjoy a day of brews, but need to keep your wits sharp? There are plenty of delicious brews under 5% for you to sip on throughout the day. That's 165 different beers with an ABV of 5% and lower. Try 5 more for Level 34!

There's beer in them thar hills! You're setting off on your journey through the world of beer, but be sure to take a little time to get to know each brewery as you go. That's a beer from 175 different breweries. Try 5 more for Level 36!
Your quest to quench your thirst leaves no stone unturned! That's at least 120 distinct venues!

It takes the perfect amount of light, the right framing and a touch of creative love to get the perfect picture of your brew. Now it’s time to drink it! That's 355 check-ins with a photo.  Try 5 more for Level 72!

If your mash uses more than 50% wheat, you’ve got yourself a wheat beer. This diverse family includes goses, hefeweizens, American wheat ales, and more! That's 35 different beers in the "Wheat" category! Try 5 more for Level 8!

While spontaneity can be fun, sometimes you want to make sure your adventure will rock. Checkout the menu at an Untappd Verified Venue before visiting and know exactly what’s on tap! That's 440 check-ins at venue that is verified.  Try 5 more for Level 89!

Once you’ve had just one, there’s no doubt you’ll be saying "I'll be bock" for another. That's 15 different Bock beers. Try 5 more for Level 4! Want to learn more about this badge? Check out our podcast

items.checkin_comment: Aroma and taste match the flavor description. Maybe a little too sweet for my liking, but non the less an enjoyable product.
As advertised. It has a strong marshmallow nose and taste to go along with those of a traditional Schwartzbier.

items.badge_description: Fresh from the tap is one of the best ways to enjoy a beer. Just try to use a glass and not drink directly from the tap, as tempting as it may be. That's 275 checkins with the serving style of Draft. Try 5 more for Level 56!

At first taste, dark ales can be overwhelming for even the most skilled of beer drinkers, but your will is weak and with time you will eventually turn to the dark side. That's 5 different beers with the style of Dark Ale, Belgian Strong Dark Ale, Lager - Dark, IPA - Black / Cascadian Dark Ale or IPA - Imperial / Double Black, Schwarzbier, or Mild - Dark. Try 5 more for Level 2!

Ahoy schwarz-buckler! Beware of the evil Black Beerd, as you sail the dark sea of suds matey. That's 15 different beers with style of Schwarzbier or Lager - Dark. Try 5 more for Level 4! Want to learn more about this badge? Check out our podcast

items.checkin_comment: First time here, and it didn't disappoint. A spot on and delicious example of the style. Always good to see some focusing on the traditional styles.

Rye isn't just for liquor anymore and many breweries are proving this with delicious rye-style variants. With a unique mix of flavors and bitterness, it'll keep you coming back for more. That's 15 different beers with style of Rye Beer, IPA - Rye, Roggenbier, or Rye Wine. Try 5 more for Level 4!

Canning is all the rage and it's not hard to see why - travels well, more environmentally friendly, and no need to carry your bottle opener. That's 190 checkins with the serving style of Can. Try 5 more for Level 39! Want to learn more about this badge? Check out our podcast
